query.pigql: q = load "PROMO_COMPLIANCE"; q = filter q by date('Date_of_audit_Year', 'Date_of_audit_Month', 'Date_of_audit_Day') in {{ selection(Date_of_audit_Year_Date_of_audit_Month_52) }}; q = filter q by 'Country' in {{ selection(Country_2) }}; q = filter q by 'City' in {{ selection(City_5) }}; q = filter q by 'Commune' in {{ selection(Commune_42) }}; q = filter q by 'Customer_type' in {{ selection(Customer_type_11) }}; q = filter q by 'Trade_Format' in {{ selection(Trade_Format_8) }}; q = filter q by 'X4P_5P_6P' in {{ selection(X4P_5P_6P_80) }}; q = filter q by 'Top_Customer' in {{ selection(Top_Customer_49) }}; q = filter q by 'Customer' in {{ selection(Customer_48) }}; q = filter q by 'Local_Outlet_Name' in {{ selection(Local_Outlet_Name_49) }}; q = filter q by 'Channel' in {{ selection(Channel_9) }}; q = filter q by 'Subchannel' in {{ selection(Subchannel_10) }}; q = filter q by 'Store_type' in {{ selection(Store_type_46) }}; q = filter q by 'Sales_region' in {{ selection(Sales_region_44) }}; q = filter q by 'Sales_area' in {{ selection(Sales_area_6) }}; q = filter q by 'Sales_territory' in {{ selection(Sales_territory_7) }}; q = filter q by 'Field_Execution_Manager' in {{ selection(Field_Execution_Manager_53) }}; q = filter q by 'Store_Operations_Manager' in {{ selection(Store_Operations_Manager_54) }}; q = filter q by 'Field_Sales_Manager' in {{ selection(Field_Sales_Manager_55) }}; q = filter q by 'Product_division' in {{ selection(Product_division_15) }}; q = filter q by 'Product_category' in {{ selection(Product_category_16) }}; q = filter q by 'Country' in {{ selection(Country_21) }}; q = filter q by 'Country' in {{ selection(Country_90) }}; q = filter q by 'X4P_5P_6P' in {{ selection(X4P_5P_6P_66) }}; q = filter q by 'X4P_5P_6P' in {{ selection(X4P_5P_6P_92) }}; q = filter q by 'Sales_region' in {{ selection(Region_85) }}; q = filter q by 'Sales_region' in {{ selection(Region_93) }}; q = filter q by 'Channel' in {{ selection(Channel_27) }}; q = filter q by 'Channel' in {{ selection(Channel_94) }}; q = filter q by 'Product_category' in {{ selection(Product_category_26) }}; q = filter q by 'Product_category' in {{ selection(Product_category_95) }}; q = filter q by 'Customer' in {{ selection(Customer_31) }}; q = filter q by 'Customer' in {{ selection(Customer_96) }}; diff = group q by all; diff = foreach diff generate avg('Promo_Compliance') as 'Percent_Diff', (case when avg('Promo_Compliance')  < 0.5 then "#EE0A50" when avg('Promo_Compliance')  < 0.7 then "#F8CE00" else "#0FD178" end) as 'color';

q = load "PROMO_SCORE"; q = filter q by 'Country' in {{ selection(Country_2) }} && 'Country' in {{ selection(Country_21) }} && 'Country' in {{ selection(Country_90) }} && 'Commune' in {{ selection(Commune_42) }} && 'Customer_type' in {{ selection(Customer_type_11) }} && 'Trade_Format' in  {{ selection(Trade_Format_8) }} && 'X4P_5P_6P' in {{ selection(X4P_5P_6P_80) }} && 'X4P_5P_6P' in {{ selection(X4P_5P_6P_66) }} && 'X4P_5P_6P' in {{ selection(X4P_5P_6P_92) }} && 'Top_Customer' in {{ selection(Top_Customer_49) }} && 'Customer' in {{ selection(Customer_48) }} && 'Customer' in {{ selection(Customer_31) }} && 'Customer' in {{ selection(Customer_96) }} && 'Local_Outlet_Name' in {{ selection(Local_Outlet_Name_49) }} && 'Channel' in {{ selection(Channel_9) }} && 'Channel' in {{ selection(Channel_27) }} && 'Channel' in {{ selection(Channel_94) }} && 'Subchannel' in {{ selection(Subchannel_10) }} && 'Sales_region' in {{ selection(Sales_region_44) }} && 'Sales_region' in {{ selection(Region_85) }} && 'Sales_region' in {{ selection(Region_93) }} && 'Sales_area' in {{ selection(Sales_area_6) }} && 'Sales_territory' in {{ selection(Sales_territory_7) }} && 'Field_Execution_Manager' in {{ selection(Field_Execution_Manager_53) }} && 'Store_Operations_Manager' in {{ selection(Store_Operations_Manager_54) }} && 'Field_Sales_Manager' in {{ selection(Field_Sales_Manager_55) }} && 'Product_division' in {{ selection(Product_division_15) }} && 'Product_category' in {{ selection(Product_category_16) }} && 'Product_category' in {{ selection(Product_category_26) }} && 'Product_category' in {{ selection(Product_category_95) }} && 'Product_market' in {{selection(Product_market_56)}} && 'Product_brand' in {{selection(Product_brand_57)}} && 'Product_sector' in {{selection(Product_sector_58)}} && 'SKU' in {{selection(SKU_84)}};cur = filter q by date('Date_of_audit_Year', 'Date_of_audit_Month', 'Date_of_audit_Day') in ["current month".."current month"];last = filter q by date('Date_of_audit_Year', 'Date_of_audit_Month', 'Date_of_audit_Day') in ["1 month ago".."1 month ago"]; diff = cogroup cur by ('Product_category', 'SKU_ID', 'SKU') full, last by ('Product_category', 'SKU_ID', 'SKU'); diff = foreach diff generate coalesce(cur::'Product_category',last::'Product_category') as 'Product_category', coalesce(cur::'SKU', last::'SKU') as 'SKU', coalesce(cur::'SKU_ID', last::'SKU_ID') as 'SKU_ID', coalesce(avg(cur.Priority_Promo)-avg(last.Priority_Promo),999) as 'promoAverage', avg(cur.Priority_Promo) as currentPromo, avg(last.Priority_Promo) as lastPromo; diff = foreach diff generate (case when promoAverage != 999 then promoAverage when currentPromo is null then (-lastPromo) else (currentPromo) end) as Percent_Diff, Product_category as 'Product_category', SKU as 'SKU', SKU_ID as 'SKU_ID';

cur by ('Product_category', 'SKU_ID', 'SKU') full, last by ('Product_category', 'SKU_ID', 'SKU'); diff = foreach diff generate coalesce(cur::'Product_category',last::'Product_category') as avg(cur.Priority_Promo) as currentPromo, avg(last.Priority_Promo) as lastPromo; diff = foreach diff generate (case when promoAverage != 999 then promoAverage when currentPromo is null then (-lastPromo) else (currentPromo) end) as Percent_Diff, Product_category as 'Product_category', SKU as 'SKU', SKU_ID as 'SKU_ID';

q = load "PROMO_SCORE"; q = filter q by 'Country' in {{ selection(Country_2) }} && 'Country' in {{ selection(Country_21) }} && 'Country' in {{ selection(Country_90) }} && 'Commune' in {{ selection(Commune_42) }} && 'Customer_type' in {{ selection(Customer_type_11) }} && 'Trade_Format' in  {{ selection(Trade_Format_8) }} && 'X4P_5P_6P' in {{ selection(X4P_5P_6P_80) }} && 'X4P_5P_6P' in {{ selection(X4P_5P_6P_66) }} && 'X4P_5P_6P' in {{ selection(X4P_5P_6P_92) }} && 'Top_Customer' in {{ selection(Top_Customer_49) }} && 'Customer' in {{ selection(Customer_48) }} && 'Customer' in {{ selection(Customer_31) }} && 'Customer' in {{ selection(Customer_96) }} && 'Local_Outlet_Name' in {{ selection(Local_Outlet_Name_49) }} && 'Channel' in {{ selection(Channel_9) }} && 'Channel' in {{ selection(Channel_27) }} && 'Channel' in {{ selection(Channel_94) }} && 'Subchannel' in {{ selection(Subchannel_10) }} && 'Sales_region' in {{ selection(Sales_region_44) }} && 'Sales_region' in {{ selection(Region_85) }} && 'Sales_region' in {{ selection(Region_93) }} && 'Sales_area' in {{ selection(Sales_area_6) }} && 'Sales_territory' in {{ selection(Sales_territory_7) }} && 'Field_Execution_Manager' in {{ selection(Field_Execution_Manager_53) }} && 'Store_Operations_Manager' in {{ selection(Store_Operations_Manager_54) }} && 'Field_Sales_Manager' in {{ selection(Field_Sales_Manager_55) }} && 'Product_division' in {{ selection(Product_division_15) }} && 'Product_category' in {{ selection(Product_category_16) }} && 'Product_category' in {{ selection(Product_category_26) }} && 'Product_category' in {{ selection(Product_category_95) }} && 'Product_market' in {{selection(Product_market_56)}} && 'Product_brand' in {{selection(Product_brand_57)}} && 'Product_sector' in {{selection(Product_sector_58)}} && 'SKU' in {{selection(SKU_84)}}; diff = cogroup cur by ('Product_category', 'SKU_ID', 'SKU') full, last by ('Product_category', 'SKU_ID', 'SKU'); diff = foreach diff generate coalesce(cur::'Product_category',last::'Product_category') as 'Product_category', coalesce(cur::'SKU', last::'SKU') as 'SKU', coalesce(cur::'SKU_ID', last::'SKU_ID') as 'SKU_ID', coalesce(avg(cur.Priority_Promo)-avg(last.Priority_Promo),999) as 'promoAverage', avg(cur.Priority_Promo) as currentPromo, avg(last.Priority_Promo) as lastPromo; diff = foreach diff generate Product_category as 'Product_category', SKU as 'SKU', SKU_ID as 'SKU_ID', (case when promoAverage != 999 then promoAverage when currentPromo is null then (-lastPromo) else (currentPromo) end) as short_Bar;

q = load "PS_OVERALL_COMPLIANCE_LV"; q = filter q by 'Country' in {{ selection(Country_2) }} && 'Country' in {{ selection(Country_21) }} && 'Country' in {{ selection(Country_90) }} && 'Commune' in {{ selection(Commune_42) }} && 'Key_Customer_Type' in {{ selection(Customer_type_11) }} && 'Trade_Format' in  {{ selection(Trade_Format_8) }} && 'PS_Standard' in {{ selection(X4P_5P_6P_80) }} && 'PS_Standard' in {{ selection(X4P_5P_6P_66) }} && 'PS_Standard' in {{ selection(X4P_5P_6P_92) }} && 'Top_Customer' in {{ selection(Top_Customer_49) }} && 'Customer' in {{ selection(Customer_48) }} && 'Customer' in {{ selection(Customer_31) }} && 'Customer' in {{ selection(Customer_96) }} && 'Outlet_Name' in {{ selection(Local_Outlet_Name_49) }} && 'Channel' in {{ selection(Channel_9) }} && 'Channel' in {{ selection(Channel_27) }} && 'Channel' in {{ selection(Channel_94) }} && 'Subchannel' in {{ selection(Subchannel_10) }} && 'Sales_Region' in {{ selection(Sales_region_44) }} && 'Sales_Region' in {{ selection(Region_85) }} && 'Sales_Region' in {{ selection(Region_93) }} && 'Sales_area' in {{ selection(Sales_area_6) }} && 'Sales_Territory' in {{ selection(Sales_territory_7) }} && 'Field_Execution_Manager' in {{ selection(Field_Execution_Manager_53) }} && 'Store_Operations_Manager' in {{ selection(Store_Operations_Manager_54) }} && 'Field_Sales_Manager' in {{ selection(Field_Sales_Manager_55) }} && 'Product_Division' in {{ selection(Product_division_15) }} && 'Product_Category' in {{ selection(Product_category_16) }} && 'Product_Category' in {{ selection(Product_category_26) }} && 'Product_Category' in {{ selection(Product_category_95) }} && 'Product_Market' in {{selection(Product_market_56)}}; diff = group q by all; diff = foreach diff generate (avg('Promo_Compliance_LV'))-(avg('Promo_Compliance')) as 'Percent_Diff',(case when (avg('Promo_Compliance_LV'))-(avg('Promo_Compliance')) < 0.5 then "#EE0A50" when (avg('Promo_Compliance_LV'))-(avg('Promo_Compliance')) < 0.7 then "#F8CE00" else "#0FD178" end) as 'color';

parameters.text: This chart displays the % of enrolled stores that were Promo compliant for the country over a period of last 13 months.
This chart lists all the audited SKUs for Promo compliance in the country, the % of enrolled stores that they were Promo compliance in the latest month, and the variance from the previous month.
This chart displays the % of SKUs that were Promo compliant, and % of Product categories that were SOF compliant in the enrolled stores for Top Customers within a country in the latest month.

This chart displays the % of SKUs that were Promo compliant, and % of Product categories that were SOF compliant in MT enrolled stores across all the Product categories in the country in the latest month.
This chart displays the % of SKUs that were Promo compliant, and % of Product categories that were SOF compliant in the enrolled stores across all the Channels in the country in the latest month.
This chart displays the % of enrolled stores that were Promo compliant across all the Channels in the country in the latest month.
This chart displays the % of enrolled stores that were Promo compliant for the latest month.
This chart displays the % of MT enrolled stores that were Promo compliant across all the Product categories in the country in the latest month.
This chart displays the % of SKUs that were Promo compliant, and % of Product categories that were SOF compliant in the enrolled stores for the country over a period of last 13 months.
This chart displays the % of SKUs that were Promo compliant, and % of Product categories that were SOF compliant in the enrolled stores for the country over a period of last 13 months.
This chart displays the % of enrolled stores that were Promo compliant for the country over a period of last 13 months.

This chart displays the % of SKUs that were Promo compliant, and % of Product categories that were SOF compliant in enrolled stores in different sales regions of the country in the latest month.
This chart displays the % of SKUs that were Promo compliant, and % of Product categories that were SOF compliant in 4P, 5P and 6P stores in the country in the latest month.
This chart displays the % of SKUs that were Promo compliant,  and % of Product categories that were SOF compliant in the enrolled stores for the country in the latest month.
This chart displays the % of enrolled stores for Top Customers within a country which were Promo Compliant in the latest month.
This chart displays the % of SKUs that were Promo compliant, and % of Product categories that were SOF compliant in the enrolled stores across all the Channels in the country in the latest month.
This chart displays the % of 4P, 5P and 6P stores that were Promo compliant for the country in the latest month.
This chart displays the % of enrolled stores that were Promo compliant across all the Channels in the country in the latest month.
This chart displays the % of MT enrolled stores that were Promo compliant across all the Product categories in the country in the latest month.
This chart displays the % of enrolled stores that were Promo compliant in different sales regions of the country in the latest month.

This chart displays the % of SKUs that were Promo compliant, and % of Product categories that were SOF compliant in 4P, 5P and 6P stores in the country in the latest month.
This chart displays the % of enrolled stores that were Promo compliant for the latest month.
This chart displays the % of 4P, 5P and 6P stores that were Promo compliant for the country in the latest month.
This chart displays the % of SKUs that were Promo compliant, and % of Product categories that were SOF compliant in enrolled stores in different sales regions of the country in the latest month.

This chart displays the % of SKUs that were Promo compliant, and % of Product categories that were SOF compliant in MT enrolled stores across all the Product categories in the country in the latest month.
This chart displays the % of enrolled stores for Top Customers within a country which were Promo Compliant in the latest month.
